description: Number of paths through an array.
references: A. M. Khidr and B. S. El-Desouky, A symmetric sum involving the Stirling numbers of the first kind, European J. Combin., 5 (1984), 51-54.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..100
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
